video_description:
So we here have the Murcielago's successor and Lambo say all the components are practically new. Big numbers here: power is up to 700bhp from it's naturally aspirated 6.5-litre V12 engine with 509lb ft of torque that revs up to 8250rpm. Weight has been reduced to 1575kg, 90kg less than the Murcielago mainly due to the lightweight carbon fibre monocoque.
This uses the new ISR transmission built by Graziano Trasmissioni, it's a single-clutch 7-speed semi-automatic but its gearshifts take only 50 milliseconds. 
With F1 style suspension, more rear biased weight distribution, a 0-62mph sprint of 2.9sec and a 217mph top speed it will be an even more focused supercar and just that little bit more insane :)
Starting at over £200,000 ($350,000), want one? 
http://www.aventador.com
title: Lamborghini Aventador LP700-4 Official Commercial [1080P]
